All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, FindAndReplaceServer, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class EditPanePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements FindAndReplaceServer

The pane which holds the edit region for an editor-type application.

Version:
